TABLE.NAME: mem_booklet_data
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains the exam data for the massive examination marker plugin

FIELD.NAME: date_finalized
FIELD.COMMENT: The date the grade is finalized and after the appeal time. exactly 1 year from this date on the exam data can be rid off. It's in Epoch Time.

FIELD.NAME: course_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The numeric course id for the course

FIELD.NAME: year_semester_origin
FIELD.COMMENT: The year and semester this exam booklet is from. e.g. 2015 WINTER

FIELD.NAME: exam_hash
FIELD.COMMENT: a MD5 hash to uniquely identify a batch of generated exam upon generating the exams.

TABLE.NAME: mem_mark_stats
TABLE.COMMENT: The collection of total score the booklet has.

FIELD.NAME: total_booklet_score
FIELD.COMMENT: The summed marks of each page of the booklet.

FIELD.NAME: total_booklet_score_max
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum amount of marks the booklet can have.

FIELD.NAME: exam_hash
FIELD.COMMENT: a MD5 hash to uniquely identify a batch of generated exam upon generating the exams.

KEY.NAME: exam_hash
KEY.COMMENT: a MD5 hash to uniquely identify a batch of generated exam upon generating the exams.

TABLE.NAME: mem_pdf_files
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the binary PDF files of the marked exams.

FIELD.NAME: page_num
FIELD.COMMENT: The page number of the file

FIELD.NAME: pdf_comments
FIELD.COMMENT: the comments file that the image will have if marked.

FIELD.NAME: booklet_num
FIELD.COMMENT: the booklet number on the QR code. idependent from the foreign key booklet_id. This QR code booklet number is not unique (only unique within that batch of generated exam pdf).

FIELD.NAME: exam_hash
FIELD.COMMENT: a MD5 hash to uniquely identify a batch of generated exam upon generating the exams.

TABLE.NAME: mem_pages
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains the amount of marks per page for a booklet.

FIELD.NAME: page_marks
FIELD.COMMENT: The amount of marks this page got.

FIELD.NAME: page_marks_max
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum amount of marks this page can earn.

FIELD.NAME: page_num
FIELD.COMMENT: the page number of this exam

FIELD.NAME: exam_hash
FIELD.COMMENT: a MD5 hash to uniquely identify a batch of generated exam upon generating the exams.
